description: MK Dons come from behind to beat struggling Morecambe and pick up a first win in eight League Two matches.
title: Milton Keynes Dons 2-1 Morecambe
title_page: Milton Keynes Dons 2-1 Morecambe - BBC Sport
maintext:
MK Dons have won six of their last seven league games against Morecambe (L1), scoring 2.8 goals on average across those six victories.
Morecambe will be looking to win successive away league games against MK Dons for the first time, after winning 2-1 on their last visit to Stadium:MK in January 2024.
MK Dons have won just one of their last eight home league games (D2 L5), losing each of their last two 1-0 to Bromley and Colchester United.
